body:
Mr typical Japanese character guy, you don't have to be such a dick about it, just leave the vanillatards be.

Respectfully, me.
"However, when I'm not careful, they tend to get too dark." I think that shove off the table could've been a whole lot different....
This was nice the mc was ok just treat her like a human more she seems nice 👌
Saw the japanese version a few years ago, it's finally translated! Thank you. 100/10
Aww she was so nice and pretty I'd take care of her too
She’s so erotic😭😭

Eitherway, don't stick around if you're too vanillasoy that this got you triggered, you might as well stay away from this since it won't get any more wholesum, in fact, chapter three has lil' low loader here choking her out like a bitch, makes her pass out. So get ready to feel weird while tugging/poking it, honestly, these type of works are way too high level for normie chumps, just stick to your seasonal meme anime shipping-bait show with the typical japanosuke-kun mc #661902345~whatever and his fabulous harem-romcom-power fantasy-feels good to self-insert like the author shamelessly does where the narrative isn't "will mc get everything handed to him?", but "how fast will the show's hack author fold and hand everything down to his self-in err to the mc on a silver platter if they already hadn't from the get-go!". That way, you won't have to get upset and write angry crap in the comment section. Most of you would do the same, fat boy is keeping it straight, pump n' dump (p.43). *2¢s*

Haa, I knew this one was best left untranslated, as it would attract the normies and the whoresum vanilla crowd which are the main group of hypocrite stinkers you want to gatekeep this away from, for they are too emotional and tend to take these type of works personally. On the other hand, thanks to the translation, I now know that the "singing lady" on tv is the same one getting fucked in the video, fun fact which flew over me, thought it was some random porn. As for the plump chump, look, he's clearly supposed to be the typical fat ol' brown ugly bastard archetype that is so prominent in japan, but, with the twist of having him de-aged to the girl's number, author must have thought himself a genious for that, probably. The way he acts and thinks, it's like some 25~30y/o+ in the body of school boy. A cocksleeve, huh? You got to be kidding, no school kid thinks like that, or maybe jap kids are something else in that regard. Just think of him as a de-aged fat ugli bastard living it out.
That guy is a piece of shit...   Are there other (nicer) doujins with airhead/retard girls/guys?
I would prefer if he was nice to her
V agreed, I know this is technically a rape doujin but give the guy a redemption or something
If only he was nicer to her... also a toy I wouldn't count just a toy as anal.
She felt good guys so it's all ok
The guy only uses her for sex lol
Goodbyes. later soon kid Pregnant, ^ Hell Boy abuse Go Jail....., Girls friends Girls only
The author really is talented. Props to you, but this is kinda fucked up tbh.
Mf in page 53 felt the real terror
page 43 is so mean :'( anyway imagine having a retarded little girl like her as a cum dumpster, so cute <3
Yoo @Rogal Dong where u at the imperial fist is still trying to find u
part 2 maybe when you saw that rascal hang himself
part 2 might be bad, well part 3 made it somewhat wholesome again
This is kinda fuckup even for me considering i like hardcore ntr, and i thought i have seen all the fucked up things
that's kinda messed up even for me
it's a no go
I have no problems with cruel things, but for some reason page 43 made me hate the guy. Doujin is good overall.
Oh, there's part 2. I was wondering why it wasn't there already.
what a dickhead
Meh, the first half was enough.
Absolute scum peko
This guy belongs in Arkham
Honestly, my perspective of the guy changed at part 2. The girl he marries someday will definitely be plunged in physical abuse.
Did this dickhead just push her off as soon as he's done? The fuckin cunt, hope he gets jumped in an alley and have his head caved in. Then we'll see who's retarded

i hope no one does this kind of thing irl, 
i feel bad for her 😞
great read. not adding to favorites brain said “this is how you get psychopaths and yanderes.” if there is a follow up i will favorite if it’s good
The title is hilarious.

Kind of conflicting feelings here. On the one hand, the girl still enjoyed herself more than usual, but on the other, he kept dragging her off whenever she was starting to enjoy anything other than sex... guy is a scumbag but girl is too dumb to realize it and just enjoys the simple things he allows. 
Bittersweet story, I'd say.
asshole kid, but...
An asshole he is, but, I Rogal Dong thinks his heart is in the right place, for I have seen worse in this library of heretics.
The dude is here pretty shitty for doing that this is by far one of my worst faps
